noDisplayTerritories: &7D |&f You haven't selected any display territories yet! Please select two points with a diamond axe
createDisplayCommand: &7D |&f Now type /display create to create a display
secondPointNotSelected: &7D |&f You haven't selected the second point yet!
displayOverlap: &7D |&f There is already a display in this area!
structureTooLarge: &7D |&f You can't create a display larger than 32x24 blocks
structureTooSmall: &7D |&f You can't create a display smaller than 1x1 blocks
firstPointSelected: &7D |&f First point selected! Now select the second point
structureWrongDepth: &7D |&f Selection must be at least 1 block long
wrongStructure: &7D |&f Only black concrete blocks can be used for displays
displayCommandMissingPermission: &7D |&f You don't have permission to use this command!
commandPlayersOnly: &7D |&f This command can only be used by a player in-game
successfulCreation: &7D |&f Display has been created! Now focus on it and type /display video <youtube_url> [lang] to set a video
invalidURL: &7D |&f Your URL is invalid! Please use a valid YouTube link
reportTooQuickly: &7D |&f You are sending reports too quickly! Please wait before sending another report
reportFailed: &7D |&f Failed to send report. Please try again later.
reportNotConfigured: &7D |&f Report system is disabled on this server!

extra.text: New version %s of Dream Displays is available! Please

newPluginVersion: &7D |&f New version of Dream Displays plugin (%s) is available! Please update the server plugin!
configReloadFailed: &7D |&f Failed to reload Dream Displays. Please check the console for errors
display.enabled: &7D |&f Displays enabled. Please wait for a moment...
displayHelpVideo: – /display video <url>: set video for your display
displayHelpInfo: – /display info: show details of the display you're looking at
displayHelpDelete: – /display delete: delete the display you're looking at
